Articles.Content: Can we have good language on the server? I've "heard" a few F-Bombs...

49 minutes ago, KAL 9000 said:

Can we have good language on the server? I've "heard" a few F-Bombs...

Yeah refrain from explicits if possible. Follow Das' example from KSPTV.

For those concerned; I've done some checking and have to say this as to Sparky. If we don't hear from him by the 22nd of January, things will be grim. 

My math points to anywhere from 22nd of Dec to the 12 of Jan is his recovery point. Got a long time til then, but keep him in your mind.

Sparky helped me early on with the desert/tree farm line.  My first and biggest project.  Also one of the first people i encountered on the server.

 

Heart beating fast as described is likely a valve or structure issue.  Not a light thing.  Basically you are totally bedridden and not allowed to do anything that might elevate your pulse till whatever they do to you is fully healed and properly healed.

 

Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.  Lets hope all ends well & he returns more chipper than ever.

 

- Andy

17 hours ago, max_creative said:

What about the GuysWeReallyShouldBuildAMonumentForMkAndZoo! We can call it the Taj Sparkal when Sparky gets back and says "Ok guys! I'm dead!"

I'm just having it as the Palace de Sparky for now; Taj Sparkle has lost its grandeur after it was learned it was for a dead queen...

10 hours ago, ZooNamedGames said:

For those concerned; I've done some checking and have to say this as to Sparky. If we don't hear from him by the 22nd of January, things will be grim. 

My math points to anywhere from 22nd of Dec to the 12 of Jan is his recovery point. Got a long time til then, but keep him in your mind.

Omg.... I CAN'T WAIT 20 DAYS FOR THIS!!!!! THE STRESS IS GETTING TO ME!!!! I MUST KNOW!!!

So the whole "towers are bad for data use".  I see three new huge towers, all empty etc.  I keep getting massive lag every time i get near paradise now because of all these huge towers that are nice to look at but serve no purpose and sit there eating up the server's set data limit.  One of these new towers is for some reason sitting on top of a lovely meadow area with trees now full of dirt and wrecked my passageway which i had to go in and fix.  If you break stuff i made, i will put it back how it was as best i can.  If you see a name on something, you can't just plow it over.  ASK.  Like, here it is, if you mess up something i build, i'm going to undo whatever you did.  Sucks that it has come to this, but this whole thing isn't just some anarchistic free-for-all.  I mean, we have rules for my girlfriend's young kids that include: no bad messes, no touching stuff that isnt yours without permission, and be respectful of people and property.  Please don't tell me we can't follow those rules but a 4 year old can.

 

Folks, I need to be honest, i'm getting a bit frustrated.  What the hell is wrong with reasonably scaled structures that are actually 100% in use?  If this keeps going i'm definitely going to not be a part of this anymore, even if to save MK's internet data usage.  And why is ANYONE in creative mode?  If something needs to be moved etc i get it, but otherwise you're creating a stratified playing experience.  I know this is going to be fixed soon (dec 10) but come on.  /rant

 

- Andy

/give TransitBiker minecraft:rant 64 

I agree dude! 

12 minutes ago, transitbiker said:

What the hell is wrong with reasonably scaled structures that are actually 100% in use?

The Creative is far enough away that it's fine right? And I'm using all of the space inside it. 

Zentro's building his tower in survival mode and he's using all of it so that's different. He's not finished. 

13 minutes ago, transitbiker said:

And why is ANYONE in creative mode?  If something needs to be moved etc i get it, but otherwise you're creating a stratified playing experience. 

The Creative isn't being built in creative! Why are your towers (which are definitely smaller than it) being built in creative? (People who always play survival and don't use creative mode just ignore me).

26 minutes ago, max_creative said:

The Creative is far enough away that it's fine right? And I'm using all of the space inside it.

If you are continuously in it, the server will probably suffer...

43 minutes ago, max_creative said:

/give TransitBiker minecraft:rant 64 

I agree dude! 

The Creative is far enough away that it's fine right? And I'm using all of the space inside it. 

Zentro's building his tower in survival mode and he's using all of it so that's different. He's not finished. 

The Creative isn't being built in creative! Why are your towers (which are definitely smaller than it) being built in creative? (People who always play survival and don't use creative mode just ignore me). 

Literally everything i make is as small as it can practically be.  The biggest thing i made was the house on my island which is supposed to be a "look what i can build with a little help if left alone".  I mined or everything.  Sure, i had help, but i'm not here to be on creative, i already have like 8 worlds on my own singleplayer mode to do that with.

 

My island house has a roof with a diving platform (you can dive into an enclosed pool).  Under that is the bedroom with basically just a bed and a chest.  Armor stand and some item frames will likely go in there.  Under that is my primary processing and crafting area, and some storage.  This is the main floor when you enter.  under that is a new area i just made a few days ago for storing lots of the same stuff so i dont have to make tons of runs all the way back to spawn/paradise every time i play.  Under that is a plain empty room that leads into the island mine.  This room is simply a shortcut so i don't have to go above ground outside, saves a bit of time.  I don't plan on putting anything down here.  Out front i have a boat dock & a stairway from there to the front door.  There are trees on the island that were there when i started building the house.  That whole side of the island only has torches, otherwise untouched/natural.  The other "hallf" is all house/stone decking.  Oh, yeah, there's the water access tubes to the ravine i found below the island as well as a future ladder location (super deadly dangerously long fall, don't mess with it) covered for now.  The whole island is less than two tower floor's worth of load on the server i bet, yet it serves all my needs in the game plus some fun extras, like automatic doors.

 

Go check it out if you like, it's at 1318 3326.

 

- Andy

Well, my tower isn't going to be that tall and I'm planning to fill it with redstone contraptions, so it won't be useless. I'm definetly gonna check out your island house, @transitbiker! 

Edit:

I only used creative once for restoring lost progress. That's fine, right?

 

Edited December 3, 2016 by ZentroCatson

13 hours ago, ZentroCatson said:

Well, my tower isn't going to be that tall and I'm planning to fill it with redstone contraptions, so it won't be useless. I'm definetly gonna check out your island house, @transitbiker! 

Edit:

I only used creative once for restoring lost progress. That's fine, right?

 

I'm not here to make the server a hair splitting police state or make rules up, i'm not an op or moderator, just a player.  I simply expressed my opinion, which no one is required to agree with.  I am interested to see what comes of the redstone you speak of. 

 

When you go to my island there are two things you should be aware of.  One: the roofed forest nearby is a sanctuary that i manage by replanting and etc, it's the primary source for all my tools, so if you need wood the remote tree farm site (also a roofed forest) is both closer and easier to get to via the rail line.  The second thing is that the forest near my island is absolutely thick with dangerous mobs, small ponds you have to place blocks to get out of etc, so please be careful.  The best way to get there is to go to the eastern desert, then keep going straight out from the terminal till you hit water.  There's an arrow of torches and a spire of some kind to get you to the best area of the water if you veer off to the right (the side the station is on a bit as you go out (kinda diagonal).

 

- Andy

Oh, right.  I am in the process of making the inner shell of the station at paradise all stone brick, and laying an extra 3 block tall buffer all around the perimeter of the station building.  There is a hole i left (fell through it by accident & died) that is directly above the redstone works room below the station proper.  Just be careful not to fall like i did, it's not survivable even with enchantments etc.

 

I have already replaced all of the dirt visible inside the station (lower concourse) with stone brick, and plan to do the same with the entire inside wall.  Any mural/design suggestions are welcome.

 

- Andy

Grand Exchange, Library and Fire Station all now open. So feel free to put your trade requests at the Grand Exchange; to put any of your written books in the library and to call the Fire Dept in case of Fire. 

Also there is a little rail I made going straight to the Grand Exchange. It's prizmarine block entrance near a merchant stand.

SPARKY! We've been waiting for you and worrying about you the entire time! I'm glad you're alright, you're a really good friend  

@transitbiker I visited your island house yesterday, its not hard to understand why you built your house in such a remote location. The island archipel is just beautiful  Do you have an idea how we should call it? I want to build myself a chillout place (probably a houseboat) there and Max said something about viking ships... Are you alright with people building stuff there? You're the landlord, after all.

I wanted to build a nether pathway there at first, but I think going to such a beautiful place should be a little challenge. What do you think?

Ps. Don't worry about me getting into sticky situations, if I'm out adventuring, I normally have my diamond armor and superbow on me. And I'm a really good archer

I kinda built where i did to be far away from everyone else.  I have my "in town" addresses at paradise & sanctuary with the glass fort and the apartment tower.  I personally like that sparky's desert beach house is well over 1000 blocks away.  No path or nether portal, please, it's supposed to be a rugged journey out from the desert terminal.  The plan is to create a small street grid at the desert terminal.  The plan is also to create a simple automated cargo tram that goes far, far, far out into the desert to a very remote location to service mining & resource gathering activities.  Also, there will be a cargo terminal adjacent to the desert line cart dispenser (yet to be built, i don't redstone, someone will have to build that who isn't me) which does not share carts with the passenger rail line.  Carts with stuff in it (dispenser, furnace, chest etc) should not be mixed in with carts you ride in.

 

- Andy
